entries.notes: ('quartettino ... opera piccola') in Boccherini's autograph catalogue.

sources.autograph: Paris, Conservatoire, MS. 1292 (with a note 'Laus Deo'; for title and comment, see No. 189)
ms_copies_parts: Naples, Conservatorio. Two copies: 22.5.2, and 22.5.6, 'Quartetto no. 2...'
Paris, Conservatoire, a parcel of copies (see No. 189)
sources.first_edition: (1778?), Paris, Sieber: Op. 27 no. 2 (for title, see No. 191)
later_editions: (c. 1785?), Amsterdam, Hummel: Op. 11 no. 2 (for title, see No. 191)
sources.modern_edition: (c. 1930), Leipzig, Peters: Op. 27 no. 2 (separate parts; revised by R. Hofmann). This edition was re-published c. 1943 by the International Music Co., New York

partial_notes: Page shows continuation of entry 195 from previous page, with movements and sources information, plus the beginning of the same entry's catalog information at bottom
